full_title: Pipes of Peace by Paul McCartney
name: Pipes of Peace

songs.full_title: Pipes of Peace by Paul McCartney
songs.title: Pipes of Peace
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
I light a candle to our love
In love our problems disappear
But all in all, we'll soon discover
That one and one is all we long to hear

[Verse 1]
All around the world
Little children being born to the world
Got to give them all we can 'til the war is won
Then will the work be done?

[Chorus]
Help them to learn (Help them to learn)
Songs of joy instead of "burn, baby, burn" (Burn, baby, burn)
Let us show them how to play the pipes of peace
Play the pipes of peace

[Chorus 2]
Help me to learn
Songs of joy instead of "burn, baby, burn"
Won't you show me how to play (How to play)
The pipes of peace? (Pipes of peace)
Play the pipes of peace
Ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh

[Verse 2]
What do you say? (Do you say)
Will the human race be run in a day? (In a day)
Or will someone save this planet we're playing on?
Is it the only one?
What are we going to do?

[Chorus 3]
Help them to see (Help them to see)
That the people here are like you and me (Like you and me)
Let us show them how to play (How to play)
The pipes of peace (Pipes of peace)
Play the pipes of peace
Ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh

[Outro]
I light a candle to our love
In love our problems disappear
But all in all, we soon discover
That one and one is all we long to hear

songs.full_title: Say Say Say by Paul McCartney (Ft. Michael Jackson)
songs.title: Say Say Say
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1: Paul McCartney]
Say, say, say what you want
But don't play games with my affection
Take, take, take what you need
But don't leave me with no direction

[Hook 1: Michael Jackson]
All alone, I sit home by the phone
Waiting for you, baby (baby)
Through the years, how can you stand to hear
My pleading for you?
You know I'm crying oo oo oo oo oo
Yeah, yeah

[Verse 2: Paul McCartney]
Now go, go, go where you want
But don't leave me here forever
You, you, you, stay away
So long girl, I see you never

[Hook 2: Michael Jackson]
What can I do, girl, to get through to you?
Cause I love you, baby (baby)
Standing here, baptized in all my tears
Baby through the years, you know I'm crying
Oo oo oo oo oo

(You've got to say, say, say
You've got to say, say, say...)

[Bridge: Paul McCartney and Michael Jackson]
You never ever worry
And you never shed a tear
You're saying that my love ain't real
Just look at my face these tears ain't drying

[Verse 3: Paul McCartney]
You, you, you, can never say
That I'm not the one who really loves you
I pray, pray, pray, everyday
That you'll see things, girl, like I do

[Hook 2: Michael Jackson]
What can I do, girl, to get through to you
Cause I love you, baby (love you / baby)
Standing here, baptized in all my tears
Baby through the years, you know I'm crying
Oo oo oo oo oo

[Outro: Paul McCartney and Michael Jackson]
Oo oo oo oo oo (say, say, say)
Oo oo oo oo oo
Oh baby
Oo oo oo oo oo
Oh baby
Oh baby
(Oo oo oo, oo oo oo, oo oo ooo...)
Oh baby
(Oo oo oo, oo oo oo, oo oo ooo...)
Oh baby
Oh baby
Say, say, say (Say, say, say)
Oo oo oo say, say, say, Oo oo oo say, say, say...
Come on
(Say, say, say, Say, say, say, Say, say, say...)
Come on
Oo oo oo say, say, say, Oo oo oo say, say, say
Oo oo oo yeah, yeah, yeah, Oo oo oo yeah, yeah, yeah
Oo oo oo say, say, say, Oo oo oo say, say, say...
Oo oo oo
Say, say, say
Oo oo oo (come on)
(Say, say, say)

songs.full_title: The Other Me by Paul McCartney
songs.title: The Other Me
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I know I was a crazy fool
For treating you the way I did
But something took a hold of me
And I acted like a dustbin lid
I didn't give a second thought
To what the consequence might be
I really wouldn't be surprised
If you were trying to find another me

[Chorus]
'Cause the other me would rather be the glad one
The other me would rather play the fool
I want to be the kind of me
That doesn't let you down as a rule

[Verse 2]
I know it doesn't take a lot
To have a little self-control
But every time that I forgot
Well I landed in another hole
But everytime you pull me out
I find it harder not to see
That we can build a better life
If I can try to find the other me

[Chorus]
The other me would rather be the glad one
Yeah, the other me would rather play the fool
Said I want to be the kind of me
That doesn't let you down as a rule

[Bridge]
But if I ever hurt you
Well you know that it's not real
It's not easy living by yourself
So imagine how I feel

[Verse 3]
I wish that I could take it back
I'd like to make a different mood
And if you let me try again
I'll have a better attitude
Well I know that one and one makes two
And that's what I want us to be
I really would appreciate it
If you'd help me find the other me

[Chorus]
The other me would rather be the glad one
The other me would rather play the fool
But I want to be the kind of me
That doesn't let you down as a rule

songs.full_title: Keep Under Cover by Paul McCartney
songs.title: Keep Under Cover
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Love, I'm going to pick you up in the morning
Love, I'm going to take you out on a journey
I don't know where I'm going to
But I know what I've been going through
Without you by my side

[Verse 1]
What good is butter if you haven't got bread?
What good is art when it hurts your head?
Might as well be in bed
Keep under cover till the battle has ceased
Keep out of trouble till the prisoners are released

[Verse 2]
What good's a puzzle when you haven't a clue?
What good is me when I'm not with you?
Might as well stay in bed
Keep under cover till the clouds disappear
Keep out of trouble till the weather is bright and clear

[Chorus]
Love, I'm going to pick you up
I'm going to take you out
I don't know what I'm gonna do
But I know what I've been going through
Without you by my side
Without you by my side

[Verse 3]
What good is tennis when there isn't a ball?
What good's a curtain without a call?
Might as well be in bed
Keep under cover till the battle has ceased
Keep out of trouble till the prisoners are released

[Chorus]
Love, I'm going to pick you up
I'm going to take you out
I don't know what I'm going to do
But I know what I've been going through
Without you by my side
Without you by my side

[Outro]
Keep under cover
Keep under cover, yeah
Keep under cover
Keep under cover, ah ah ah ah
Keep under cover

songs.title: So Bad
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
There is a pain, inside my heart
You mean so much to me
Girl I love you, girl I love you so bad
And if you leave my pain will go
But that's no good to me
Girl I love you, yes I love you so bad

[Chorus]
Well it feels so good, sometimes it feels so bad
This is worse than anything I've ever had

[Verse 2]
There was a pain but now you're here
And I don't fear a thing
Girl I love you, yes I love you so bad
And she said, boy I love you
Boy I love you so bad

[Refrain]
Girl, I love you
Girl, I love you so bad

[Chorus]
Well it feels so good, sometimes it feels so bad
This is worse than anything I've ever had

[Verse 2]
There was a pain but now you're near
And I don't fear a thing
Girl I love you, girl I love you so bad
She said, boy I love you
Boy I love you so bad

[Outro]
Girl, I love you
Girl, I love you

songs.full_title: The Man by Paul McCartney (Ft. Michael Jackson)
songs.title: The Man
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
There's a man
Who plays the game of life so well
Ooh there's such a man
His thoughts you can never tell
Ooh

[Chorus 1]
And it's just the way he thought it would be
'Cause the day has come for him to be free
Then he laughs, he kicks then rolls up his sleeves
I'm alive and I'm here forever
This is the man

And it's just the way he thought it would be
'Cause the day has come for him to be free
Then he laughs, he kicks then rolls up his sleeves
I'm alive and I'm here forever
This is the man

[Verse 2]
There's a man
Everybody thought they knew
Ooh there's such a man
He's not like me and you
Ooh

[Chorus 2]
And it's just the way she thought it would be
As he says, something has happened to me
Then he laughs, he kicks and rolls up his sleeves
I'm alive and I'm here forever
This is the man

And it's just the way he thought it would be
'Cause the day has come for him to be free
Then he laughs as he smiles and rolls up his sleeves
I'm alive and I'm here forever
This is the man

[Guitar Solo]

[Verse 3]
Did you know this man can do anything?
Ooh there's such a man
I wish that we could bring
Ooh

[Chorus 3]
And it's just the way he thought it would be
'Cause the day has come for him to be free
Then he laughs, he kicks then rolls up his sleeves
I'm alive and I'm here forever
This is the man

And it's just the way he thought it would be
'Cause the day has come for him to be free
Then he laughs, he kicks then rolls up his sleeves
I'm alive and I'm here forever
This is the man

[Outro]
This is the man
This is the man
This is the man

songs.full_title: Sweetest Little Show by Paul McCartney
songs.title: Sweetest Little Show
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Well, they can treat you like a brother
Yeah, they can treat you like a clown
But if they treat you like a lover
They've got the sweetest little show in town

[Chorus]
You got the sweetest little show
Sweetest little show
Sweetest little show in town

[Bridge]
You've been around a long time
But you're still good for a while
And if they try to criticize you
Make 'em smile, make 'em smile

[Verse 2]
And if they treat you like a brother
Well you will never, never let 'em down
But if they treat you like a lover
They've got the sweetest little show in town

[Chorus]
They got the sweetest little show
Sweetest little show
Sweetest little show in town

You've got the sweetest little show
Sweetest little show
Sweetest little show in town

[Instrumental Break]

[Outro]
You got the sweetest little show
Sweetest little show

songs.title: Average Person
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus 1]
Look at the average person
Speak to the man in the street
Can you imagine the first one you'd meet?

[Verse 1]
Well, I'm talking to a former engine driver (driver)
Trying to find out what he used to do
Tells me that he always kept his engine (engine)
Spit and polished up as good as new
But he said his only great ambition
Was to work with lions in a zoo
(Oh, to work with lions in a zoo)
Yes dear, you heard right
Told me his ambition was to work with lions every night

[Chorus 2]
Look at the average person
Speak to the man on the beat
Can you imagine the first one you'd meet?

[Verse 2]
Well, I met a woman working as a waitress (waitress)
I asked exactly what it was she did
Said she worked the summer crowd at seasides (seasides)
Winter time she ran away and hid
Once she had a Hollywood audition
But the part was given to a kid
Yes, the part was given to a kid
Yes sir, you heard right
Hollywood ambition made a starlet grow up overnight

[Instrumental Bridge]

[Verse 3]
Well I bumped into a man who'd been a boxer (boxer)
Asked him what had been his greatest night
He looked into the corners of his memory (memory)
Searching for a picture of a fight
But he said he always had a feeling
That he lacked a little extra height
(Could've used a little extra height)
Yes mate, you heard right
He always had a feeling that he might have lacked a little height

[Chorus 3]
Look at the average person
Speak to the man in the queue
Can you imagine the first one is you?

[Outro]
Look at the average person

songs.title: Hey Hey
songs.lyrics:
Hey, hey
Hey, hey
Hey, hey

Hey, hey
Hey, hey
Hey, hey

Hey, hey
Hey, hey

That's all!

songs.full_title: Tug of Peace by Paul McCartney
songs.title: Tug of Peace
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
It's a tug of war
No, no, your troubles cease
When you learn to play the pipes of peace
It's a tug of war
No, no, your troubles cease
When you learn to play the pipes of peace
What with one thing and another
It's a tug of war
No, no, no, no

[Verse 2]
It's a tug of war
No, no, your troubles cease
When you learn to play the pipes of peace
It's a tug of war
Learn to play the pipes of peace

[Outro]
Pushing, pushing
Pulling, pulling
Pushing, pulling

songs.full_title: Through Our Love by Paul McCartney
songs.title: Through Our Love
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
We wasted time and again on things
Things we already knew
Born to do, I give my love to you

[Verse 1]
Whenever you get some time
Whenever you get some time
I'd like to roll it all up in a ball
And spend it with you
You've got the power of love
And love has the power to make it come true

[Chorus 1]
We can go through our love
We can do things that they said were impossible
Though our love
We can do all that we want to do
We can go through our love
We can go through our love

[Verse 2]
Whenever you will be mine
Whenever you will be mine
I want to be with you
Just want to do whatever feels right
You've got the power of love
And love has the power to turn on the light

[Chorus 2]
Here we go through our love
We can see things that they said were invisible
Through our love
We can see where we are going to
We're going through our love
Through our love
We can learn to do things that they said were impossible
Through our love
We can be blessed with a better view
We can go through our love
We can go through our love
We can go through our love

songs.full_title: Ode to a Koala Bear by Paul McCartney
songs.title: Ode to a Koala Bear
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Oh, I love you, I still care
All my affection's there
I will walk with you to the end of the passage
My little koala type bear
Little koala type bear

[Verse 2]
I can see you sitting there
With your silent smile
I won't talk to you for a couple of minutes
My little koala type bear
Little koala type bear

[Bridge]
Tell me what it's like
Looking out of eyes
Like the likes of yours
Do you find it so surprising
That the likes of me
Likes the likes of you?

[Verse 3]
I still love you, yes, I do
All my time on earth
Will belong to you till the end of the passage
My little koala type bear
Little koala type bear

[Verse 4]
Oh I love you
I still care
All my affection's there
I will walk with you till the end of the passage
My little koala (koala) type bear (koala)
Little koala (koala) type bear
Oh, oh, oh, ooh

[Verse 1]
Oh, I love you, I still care
All my affection's there
I will walk with you to the end of the passage
My little koala (koala) type bear (koala)
Little koala (koala) type bear

[Outro]
Oh, oh, oh, oh
Oh, oh, oh
Doo, doo, doo
Doo, doo, doo, doo, doo, doo, doo, doo

songs.full_title: Twice in a Lifetime by Paul McCartney
songs.title: Twice in a Lifetime
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Now I know that it can easily happen
To someone like me
I don't want to step on anybody's toes

[Verse 1]
Who knows how to find love
Think before you give your answer
Who knows what a mystery may bring

[Chorus 1]
Once in a life I'm a lucky man
If I can find the kind of love
That's going to last for me
Twice in a lifetime
Is one of those unspoken dreams
We usually reserve for fantasy

[Verse 2]
Who knows how we find love
Stop before you give your answer
Who knows where the mystery begins
I know, I know
I know because it's happening to me
I know, I know

[Chorus 2]
Twice in a lifetime
Is one of those unspoken dreams
We usually reserve for fantasy

[Verse 3]
Who knows how to find love
You stop before you give the answer
Who knows what a mystery begins
I know, I know
I know because it's happening to me
I know, I know

[Outro]
Oh I know, I know
I know because it's happening to me
I know, I know
